data.actual_result: An annoyingly large embed is displayed
data.expected_result: No embed should display like with message links from server messages
data.short_description: DM message links still display an embed
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a DM with a user and send a message - Copy the link of the message - Post it into the DM and observe (Don't forget to have the embed settings enabled in your User Settings)
